package org.apache.commons.math.stat.clustering;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import org.apache.commons.math.stat.clustering.Clusterable;

/* JADX WARN: Classes with same name are omitted:
  classes5.dex
 */
/* loaded from: ShimmerCapture_1.3.1_APKPure.apk:libs/commons-math-2.2.jar:org/apache/commons/math/stat/clustering/Cluster.class */
public class Cluster<T extends Clusterable<T>> implements Serializable {
    private static final long serialVersionUID = -3442297081515880464L;
    private final List<T> points = new ArrayList();
    private final T center;

    public Cluster(T center) {
        this.center = center;
    }

    public void addPoint(T point) {
        this.points.add(point);
    }

    public List<T> getPoints() {
        return this.points;
    }

    public T getCenter() {
        return this.center;
    }
}
